short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate QR code for any page to allow link sharing from browser to other devices.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: QRL (for QR link) allows you to quickly share links between your browser window and your devices (mobile, tablets etc...). Just click on the extension button and scan the QR code to open it on your phone.
